page.title: 20CONTRIBUTORS
page.content:
This D Block was compiled by the following:- {Lothersdale County Primary School.}(35 pupils aged 5-11) All the children helped in the counts but the screen page information came from the Juniors.
{Glusburn County Primary School.}(275 pupils) A group of Fourth Year pupils contributed to this block under the guidance of their Headmaster. 2 boys from{Malsis School}wrote screen pages.
5 Sixth Form pupils from{South Craven {Comprehensive School}(1759 pupils) co-ordinated the information, completed the counts and typed in the screen pages during 4 days of the school's Project Week in July.
